job_tasks.phrase: zorgt voor de doorontwikkeling van ons Azure dataplatform en spart over de inzet van data.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase indicates involvement in developing the data platform and discussing its application, which requires understanding business needs and strategic goals for data utilization.

job_tasks.phrase: Sparren met zowel business stakeholders als onze Security Officer, Privacy Officer en Legal team om uit te zoeken wat wel en niet kan alvorens te implementeren
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions discussing with business stakeholders and other officers to understand constraints and possibilities before implementation, demonstrating business and compliance alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Het uitbreiden van ons dataplatform en zorgen voor een optimale ontsluiting van meerdere bronnen.
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes tasks related to expanding and optimizing a data platform and connecting multiple data sources, which are core data engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: uit te zoeken wat wel en niet kan alvorens te implementeren (bijv. row-level security, in staat zijn data te kunnen volgen, data retentie, etc.).
job_tasks.justification: Implementing security features like row-level security, data tracking, and data retention are crucial aspects of data engineering and data governance.
The act of implementation implies building or deploying features, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met data analysts en data scientists om diepgaande inzichten te genereren die de basis vormen voor procesoptimalisatie, automatisering en productontwikkeling.
job_tasks.justification: While this involves collaboration, the outcome of generating insights for process optimization, automation, and product development often requires the underlying implementation of software solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: spart over de inzet van data
Sparren met zowel business stakeholders als onze Security Officer, Privacy Officer en Legal team
Samenwerken met data analysts en data scientists
uit te zoeken wat wel en niet kan alvorens te implementeren
zorgt voor de doorontwikkeling van ons Azure dataplatform

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data platform development and data utilization, with an emphasis on data engineering and business alignment. There is no mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related modeling techniques, which are the core focus of a GenAI Engineer.
